DOC.brief_summary: The aim study identify reproductive health priority among individual live HIV.This study also seek explore factor influence fertility , family planning , sexual behavior among individual HIV receive antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) .
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Impact HIV ART Knowledge , Attitudes Practices Reproductive Health Lilongwe , Malawi
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study identify reproductive health priority among individual live HIV.This study also seek explore factor influence fertility , family planning , sexual behavior among individual HIV receive antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) . This mixed method study subject participate focus group discussion complete questionnaire . Discussions 1-2 hour length aim evaluate fertility intention , family planning , sexual health behavior . Data collect focus group analyze common theme generate questionnaire assess reproductive health knowledge , attitude practice relate family planning , fertility sexual health among person live HIV .
DOC.criteria: Focus Group Arm Client register either participate Lighthouse clinic ( Kamuzu Central Hospital ( KCH ) Bwaila Hospital ) On antiretroviral treatment ( ART ) past 6 month Sexually active within past 6 month HIV positive No exclusion criterion specify Questionnaire Arm Client register either participate Lighthouse clinic ( Kamuzu Central Hospital ( KCH ) Bwaila Hospital ) Sexually active within past 6 month HIV positive No exclusion criterion specify
